data.title: Usernames
data.statement:
<<Storyline:>>
You work for <<CodinGame>> and are asked to get rid of all fake accounts.

<<The Problem:>>
You must output all fake accounts in the given usernames.

<<Criteria of fake accounts>>(can have any one of these):
 - The string 'anonymous' (case insensitive)
 - Forbidden character like space, colon, etc.(only alphabets, numbers and underscores allowed)
 - More than one underscore

<<Note:>> If there are no fake accounts you must output 'Cleared'

testCases.title: Anonymous validator
testCases.testIn:
8
anonymous882
aNONymouse
Canonymouse
Please_dontDeleteME
IllKILLyou,ifyouthinkIamanonymous
Iamnotafake
AANONANONYMOUS
IamInnocent

testCases.title: Forbidden characters
testCases.testIn:
5
LikeIsaid,Iamnotfake
string[1:0]
Dont make me sad :(
Original Iam
amIinnocent_muahahahaaha
testCases.testOut: LikeIsaid,Iamnotfake string[1:0] Dont make me sad :( Original Iam

testCases.title: Forbidden characters Validator
testCases.testIn:
8
1.0 = 0
xD_YouWillNEVERcatchME
Mr.Hallelujah
Hello world, I am new here!
IamINEVITABLE,andIamIRONMAN
President of us. coding :)
IamYour[BIG-BOSS]
INSURANCEisKEY
testCases.testOut: 1.0 = 0 Mr.Hallelujah Hello world, I am new here! IamINEVITABLE,andIamIRONMAN President of us. coding :) IamYour[BIG-BOSS]

data.stubGenerator:
read num:int
loop num read username:string(1000)
write I do not know:(
data.outputDescription: 'Cleared'(case matters) or a list of all fake accounts separated by space (ex. Anonymous ANONYMOUS ___)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Storyline:
You work for CodinGame and are asked to get rid of all fake accounts.

The Problem:
You must output all fake accounts in the given usernames.

Criteria of fake accounts(can have any one of these):
- The string 'anonymous' (case insensitive)
- Forbidden character like space, colon, etc.(only alphabets, numbers and underscores allowed)
- More than one underscore

Note: If there are no fake accounts you must output 'Cleared'
Input
num: (integer)
username: (string)
Output
'Cleared'(case matters) or a list of all fake accounts separated by space (ex. Anonymous ANONYMOUS ___)
Constraints
0 < num < 51
0 < length(username) < 16
Example
Input
5
Mr.Anonymous
i_am_not_ANONYMOUS
anonymous
IamNOTanon
aNoNyMoUs_cow
Output
Mr.Anonymous i_am_not_ANONYMOUS anonymous aNoNyMoUs_cow
